body_html: Using tensorflow r1.10 with cuda 9.2 / cudnn 7. The code that I'm calling is located in https://github.com/huawei-tomas/scene-graph-TF-release. It seems to be an NCCL issue since caffe2 is doing the same thing. It's just that tensorflow is soaking up all the memory on the GPU while caffe2 is only taking a few percent.
